Posts.Content: Nov 16, 2017 09:59PM Mommyme36 wrote: Hi Maggiepie, I am in the same boat of waiting for a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound. It's hard. And my husband is being supportive but keeps telling me not to worry until there is something to actually worry about....easy for him to say. Hang in there you aren't alone.
Posts.Title: How did I not notice? MaggiePie Mommyme36
